secondaryEffects.effect2: Pulls enemies back to the center if they attempt to leave

spells.name: Void Tendril's Grasp
spells.secondaryEffects: The tendrils root all enemies within 8 yards for 20 seconds.

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.secondaryEffects: Transforms the target into a sheep, wandering around, unable to attack or cast spells.

spells.name: Frost Nova
spells.secondaryEffects: Roots all enemies within 12 yards in ice

spells.name: Storm Bolt
spells.secondaryEffects: Deals (29.754% of Attack power) Physical damage

spells.name: Scare Beast
secondaryEffects: Fears the beast, causing it to run in fear for up to 20 seconds

spells.name: Sundering
spells.secondaryEffects: Knock enemies to the side and causes high Physical damage

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.secondaryEffects: 10% chance to freeze the target for 4 sec

spells.name: Super Sticky Tar
spells.secondaryEffects: Enemies moving through the tar have a chance to be rooted in place for 4 sec.

spells.name: Overrun
spells.secondaryEffects: knocking back that allows attacks within 3 yards

spells.name: Double Barrel
spells.secondaryEffects: Deals 50% additional damage to targets in melee range, knock all targets in hit box 14 yds

spells.name: Deathchill
spells.secondaryEffects: Roots the target in place for 4 sec.

spells.name: Shining Force
spells.secondaryEffects: Slows movement speed by 70% for 3 sec

spells.name: Illidan's Grasp
spells.secondaryEffects: Grips target and leaps to them, disabling target and dealing damage

spells.name: Reanimation
spells.secondaryEffects: Damage Expires: 10% of their health in Shadow damage

spells.name: Tracker's Net
spells.secondaryEffects: Reduces melee and ranged hit chance by 80%

spells.name: Scatter Shot
spells.secondaryEffects: Disorients the target and deals minor damage

spells.name: Imprison
spells.secondaryEffects: Incapacitates a demon, beast, or humanoid. Damage will cancel the effect.

spells.name: Asphyxiate
spells.secondaryEffects: Cripples the target with dark energy and stuns them for 5 sec.

spells.name: Disarm
spells.secondaryEffects: Increases damage taken by disarmed enemies by 5%.

spells.name: Seduction
spells.secondaryEffects: Apply Aura: Run Speed Limit is 0%

spells.name: Hibernate
spells.secondaryEffects: Only works on Beasts and Dragonkin

spells.name: Hex
spells.secondaryEffects: Transforms the enemy into a frog, incapacitating them and preventing them from doing anything for 60 sec. Damage may interrupt the effect.

spells.name: Surge of Power
spells.secondaryEffects: Enhances the effects of the next spell

spells.name: Dead of Winter
spells.pvpModifications: Remorseless Winter's cooldown reduced by 5 seconds

spells.name: Intimidating Shout
spells.secondaryEffects: Incapacitates up to 5 enemies for 8 seconds

spells.name: Clash

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.secondaryEffects: Immune to all damage and healing

spells.name: Sleep Walk
spells.secondaryEffects: Disorients the target for the duration and damage has a chance to break the effect

spells.name: Mass Polymorph
spells.secondaryEffects: Transforms enemies into sheep, cannot attack or cast spells but regenerates health very quickly; works on Beasts, Humanoids and Critters

spells.name: Exorcism
spells.secondaryEffects: Damage over time on standing within Consecration

spells.name: Shield Charge
spells.secondaryEffects: Apply Minor Snare, Apply Aura: Stun
